q: But Steve- who'll be live on the red carpet at this weekend's Baftas for the E! Entertainment channel- stayed tight-lipped about whether he was set to join Simon Cowell for the Stateside show. I've spoken to numerous people and all I'll say about it is it's a job I really, really want and I'd love to do. I don't want to go in depth all about it because I think that's a foolish thing to do. It's just a thing I want to do and we'll see in time, he said.:: Steve Jones will host Live From The Red Carpet: The 2011 Baftas on Sunday at 5pm on E! Entertainment Television. . Andy Coulson , in his resignation statement, insisted he stood by his previous line that he was not aware of when he was News of the World editor and said he had done nothing wrong. He said that when a spokesman needs a spokesman, it is time to move on. His resignation follows months of accusations that he had been aware of and sanctioned widespread phone hacking during the period of his editorship of the paper.
